invocations.description: Requests a text string out of a popup menu from the user. This can only be called from the inputevents(table e) function. A request id can be specified in the requestid parameter. This request id will be passed to the inputevents function as the e.value1 parameter to identify later on what was requested. The e.type parameter will be IEVENT_REQUESTMENU and e.value2 will represent the chosen text string. Menu items must be added using the requestmenuitem function.
